posts.post_content:
I’m looking for some upgrades for my T205 near set and am willing to purchase the following cards in nice VG-EX or EX condition.  The cards can be raw or graded, but well-centered, front and back and have no creases.

Can anyone help out with any of the following:

Adkins

Bescher

[STRIKE]Collins, Eddie – Open Mouth [/STRIKE] - GOT HIM!

[STRIKE]Collins, Jimmy[/STRIKE] - GOT HIM!

Hoblitzell – LL, NO CIN

W.A. Latham – WA on reverse

Leifield – AP on front

If you ask a fair price, we will have a deal!

THANKS FOR YOUR CONSIDERATION!
